actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Chrysler Corporation Loan Guarantee Board should sell Chrysler stock warrants, and use the sales proceeds to reduce budget deficits.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Chrysler Corporation Loan Guarantee Board should sell the Chrysler warrants in an orderly fashion and apply the sales proceeds to a reduction in the Federal budget deficit. Requires the Secretary of the Senate to transmit a copy of this resolution to the Chrysler Corporation Loan Guarantee Board.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Chrysler Corporation Loan Guarantee Board should sell Chrysler stock warrants, and use the sales proceeds to reduce budget deficits.
